name: Brawlin' Sailor
summary: Brawlin' Sailor is a short beat 'em up game which tells a humorous story about dreams and reality. The player controls a strapping sailor who receives a letter from a damsel in distress, locked in a lighthouse on a "seckrit island" by ferocious pirates. The goal is to make it to the lighthouse, beating up the enemies and bosses encountered on the way.
